009package Ch14_Colorimetric_Color;
010
011import java.awt.color.ColorSpace;
012
013import ij.ImagePlus;
014import ij.ImageStack;
015import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
016import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
017import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
018import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
019import imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.HlsColorSpace;
020import imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.HsvColorSpace;
021import imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.LabColorSpace;
022import imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.LinearRgb65ColorSpace;
023import imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.LuvColorSpace;
024import imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.XYZ65ColorSpace;
025import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
026import imagingbook.common.image.ColorPack;
027import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
028
029import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
030
031/**
032 * ImageJ plugin, converts a sRGB color image to Lab, Luv, HLS, HSV or Linear RGB color space and shows the resulting
033 * components as a image stack (with float values).
034 *
035 * @author WB
036 * @version 2022/12/09
037 *
038 * @see LabColorSpace
039 * @see LuvColorSpace
040 * @see HlsColorSpace
041 * @see HsvColorSpace
042 * @see LinearRgb65ColorSpace
043 * @see XYZ65ColorSpace
044 * @see imagingbook.common.image.ColorPack
045 */
046public class Convert_To_Color_Stack implements PlugInFilter {
047
048        private enum TargetSpaceType {
049                Lab, Luv, HLS, HSV, LinearRGB, XYZ;
050        }
051
052        private static TargetSpaceType TargetSpace = TargetSpaceType.Lab;
053        private static boolean ReconstructRGB = false;
054
055        private ImagePlus im;
056
057        /**
058         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open.
059         */
060        public Convert_To_Color_Stack() {
061                if (noCurrentImage()) {
062                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.Flower);
063                }
064        }
065
066        @Override
067        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
068                this.im = im;
069                return DOES_RGB + NO_CHANGES;
070        }
071
072        @Override
073        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
074
075                if (!runDialog()) {
076                        return;
077                }
078
079                String title = im.getShortTitle();
080
081                ColorSpace csp = null;
082                switch(TargetSpace) {
083                        case Lab: csp = LabColorSpace.getInstance(); break;
084                        case Luv: csp = LuvColorSpace.getInstance(); break;
085                        case HLS: csp = HlsColorSpace.getInstance(); break;
086                        case HSV: csp = HsvColorSpace.getInstance(); break;
087                        case LinearRGB: csp = LinearRgb65ColorSpace.getInstance(); break;
088                        case XYZ: csp = XYZ65ColorSpace.getInstance(); break;
089                }
090
091                ColorPack cPack = new ColorPack((ColorProcessor) ip);
092                cPack.convertFromSrgbTo(csp);
093
094                ImageStack stack = cPack.toImageStack();
095                new ImagePlus(title + " (" + TargetSpace.toString() + ")", stack).show();
096
097                if (ReconstructRGB) {
098                        cPack.convertToSrgb();
099                        ColorProcessor cp = cPack.toColorProcessor();
100                        new ImagePlus(title + " (sRGB)", cp).show();
101                }
102        }
103
104        // ---------------------------------------
105
106        private boolean runDialog() {
107                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
108                gd.addMessage("Convert RGB image to Lab/Luv stack.");
109                gd.addEnumChoice("Target color space", TargetSpace);
110                gd.addCheckbox("Reconstruct RGB image", ReconstructRGB);
111
112                gd.showDialog();
113                if (gd.wasCanceled())
114                        return false;
115
116                TargetSpace = gd.getNextEnumChoice(TargetSpaceType.class);
117                ReconstructRGB = gd.getNextBoolean();
118                return true;
119        }
120
121}
